title: Copper Cabling Systems
description: Reliable copper cabling solutions engineered for consistent data transmission in enterprise and data center settings.
features: Enhanced signal clarity and transmission efficiency
detailedDescription: Our copper cabling systems are designed to provide dependable connectivity for contemporary network infrastructures. Offering options from Category 6 to 6A, these cables meet the rigorous demands of modern enterprise and data center environments.

title: Bulk Copper Cabling
description: Premium bulk copper cables tailored for enterprise and data center applications.
features: Variety of constructions: U/UTP, F/UTP, shielded
Suitable for plenum, riser, and outdoor use
Multiple jacket colors for easy identification
detailedDescription: Our bulk copper cables are crafted to deliver high performance for demanding network applications. With various configurations, these cables minimize interference and crosstalk, ensuring reliable high-speed connections.

specifications.Jacket Colors: Blue, White, Yellow, Green, Black, Red, Orange, Violet

title: TX6A™ Category 6A UTP Copper Cable
description: Advanced Category 6A UTP cable featuring Vari-MaTriX Technology for superior crosstalk suppression.
features: Available in plenum (CMP) and riser (CMR) ratings
Multiple color options for organizational flexibility
detailedDescription: The TX6A™ Category 6A UTP Copper Cable incorporates Vari-MaTriX Technology, offering exceptional alien crosstalk suppression while maintaining a smaller diameter for improved pathway fill and easier installation. Ideal for high-bandwidth and Power over Ethernet (PoE) applications.

specifications.Available Colors: Blue, Red, White, Yellow, Green, Orange, Violet

title: TX6™ Category 6 UTP Copper Cable
description: Dependable Category 6 UTP cable designed for standard enterprise networking needs.
features: Supports data rates up to 1 Gbps
Multiple jacket colors for easy identification
Available in plenum and riser ratings
detailedDescription: The TX6™ Category 6 UTP Copper Cable offers reliable performance for standard enterprise network applications. Designed to surpass industry standards, it ensures consistent transmission characteristics across all pairs.

specifications.Available Colors: Blue, White, Black, Yellow, Green, Red, Gray

title: Patch Cords
description: High-quality patch cords ensuring reliable connections between network devices.
features: Options include UTP and shielded constructions
Each cord undergoes rigorous performance testing
detailedDescription: Our patch cords provide dependable connectivity between network equipment. Available in various categories, lengths, and colors, these cords are designed for durability and consistent performance, meeting industry standards.
